page.title: 12 SCHOOLS
page.content: There are four schools in our area.There are no country schools they are all town schools.There is one private school and that is a nursery. There is one catholic school (St Puis) the rest are non-denominational. Barnhill Primary was built in 1970 and opened in August of that year.The catchment area is from Edzell Street to Balmossie Street and Arbroath Road to the beach.St Puis and Douglas are of the same design.St Puis was built in 1957,Douglas was built in 1958. The fourth school is Powrie Primary school built in 1960.These schools are all for children aged 5 to 11 who live in the housing estates.
